Class Item

java.lang.Object
Item
All Implemented Interfaces:
Purchasable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AtkBoost, AtkPlus, BasicHeal, HPrestore, MegaHeal, SpeedBoost, SpeedPlus, TierPlus
public class Item extends Object implements Purchasable
This class is the super class for all classes of type "Item" that are purchasable
Version:
1.0
Author:
Angelo Gasmin
